Uses of Class
parallel.distributed.PDBatchTaskExecutorException

  • Packages that use PDBatchTaskExecutorException 
    Package Description
    parallel.distributed
    Extends the basic functionality found in the parallel package over many remote JVMs distributed over a network of machines.

    • Uses of PDBatchTaskExecutorException in parallel.distributed

      Subclasses of PDBatchTaskExecutorException in parallel.distributed 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  PDAsynchBatchTaskExecutorException
      indicates an exception in the execution of a task collection in a remote PDAsynchBatchTaskExecutor[Wrk].
      class  PDAsynchBatchTaskExecutorNWAException
      indicates unavailability of capacity of all workers in a network of remote PDAsynchBatchTaskExecutor[Wrk] workers.
      Methods in parallel.distributed that throw PDBatchTaskExecutorException 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      private void PDBTExecSingleCltWrkInitSrv.PDBTEW2Listener.fwdCmd(PDBTExecCmd o)
      forwards the command object through the socket to the worker, and waits for an OKReply from the worker.
      int PDBTExecInitedClt.getNumConnectedWorkers()
      retrieves from the server the number of currently connected workers.
      private TaskObjectsExecutionResults PDBTExecInitedSrv.PDBTEW2Listener.runObject(TaskObjectsExecutionRequest o) 
      private TaskObjectsExecutionResults PDBTExecSingleCltWrkInitSrv.PDBTEW2Listener.runObject(TaskObjectsExecutionRequest o)
      sends the tasks execution request object o through the wire to the worker.
      private TaskObjectsExecutionResults PDBatchTaskExecutorSrv.PDBTEWListener.runObject(TaskObjectsExecutionRequest o) 
      void PDBTExecInitedCltTestInitCommand.runProtocol(PDBatchTaskExecutorSrv srv, java.io.ObjectInputStream ois, java.io.ObjectOutputStream oos)
      no-op.
      void PDBTExecInitedCltTestInitCommand2.runProtocol(PDBatchTaskExecutorSrv srv, java.io.ObjectInputStream ois, java.io.ObjectOutputStream oos)
      no-op.
      abstract void RRObject.runProtocol(PDBatchTaskExecutorSrv srv, java.io.ObjectInputStream ois, java.io.ObjectOutputStream oos) 
      void TaskObjectsExecutionRequest.runProtocol(PDBatchTaskExecutorSrv srv, java.io.ObjectInputStream ois, java.io.ObjectOutputStream oos)
      finds a free worker and submits the tasks for processing, then sends the results back to the requestor.
      void TaskObjectsAsynchExecutionRequest.runProtocol(PDBatchTaskExecutorSrv srv, java.io.ObjectInputStream ois, java.io.ObjectOutputStream oos)
      unsupported method always throws PDAsynchBatchTaskExecutorException.
      void TaskObjectsAsynchParallelExecutionRequest.runProtocol(PDBatchTaskExecutorSrv srv, java.io.ObjectInputStream ois, java.io.ObjectOutputStream oos)
      unsupported method always throws PDAsynchBatchTaskExecutorException.
      void TaskObjectsParallelExecutionRequest.runProtocol(PDBatchTaskExecutorSrv srv, java.io.ObjectInputStream ois, java.io.ObjectOutputStream oos)
      breaks tasks into batches, and for each batch (in parallel) finds a free worker and submits the tasks for processing, then gathers and sends all the results back to the requestor.
      void TaskObjectsExecutionResults.runProtocol(PDBatchTaskExecutorSrv srv, java.io.ObjectInputStream ois, java.io.ObjectOutputStream oos)
      sends back the results to the requestor (forwards).
      void PDBTExecInitedClt.submitCmd(PDBTExecCmd task)
      same as submitInitCmd(RRObject) except it may be called at any time during a program execution, instructing the server to whom it sends the command, to forward it to all connected workers (and to-be-connected workers) for execution.
      void PDBTExecInitedClt.submitInitCmd(RRObject task)
      this method must be invoked only once, prior to any other invocation of the submitWorkFromSameHost() method.
      java.lang.Object[] PDBatchTaskExecutorClt.submitWork(java.lang.String originating_client, TaskObject[] tasks)
      the main method of the class.
      private TaskObjectsExecutionResults PDBatchTaskExecutorSrv.submitWork(TaskObjectsExecutionRequest req, PDBatchTaskExecutorSrv.PDBTEWListener t) 
      private TaskObjectsExecutionResults PDBTExecInitedSrv.submitWork(TaskObjectsExecutionRequest req, PDBTExecInitedSrv.PDBTEW2Listener t)
      simply calls the method t.runObject(req) wrapped in some debug messages, and returns the result of the call.
      private TaskObjectsExecutionResults PDBTExecSingleCltWrkInitSrv.submitWork(TaskObjectsExecutionRequest rq, PDBTExecSingleCltWrkInitSrv.PDBTEW2Listener t)
      simply calls the method t.runObject(req) wrapped in some debug messages, and returns the result of the call.
      (package private) TaskObjectsExecutionResults PDBTExecInitedSrv.submitWork(java.util.Vector originating_clients, TaskObject[] tasks) 
      (package private) TaskObjectsExecutionResults PDBTExecSingleCltWrkInitSrv.submitWork(java.util.Vector originating_clients, TaskObject[] tasks) 
      java.lang.Object[] PDBatchTaskExecutorClt.submitWork(java.util.Vector originating_clients, TaskObject[] tasks)
      same method as submitWork(client, tasks) but carries all the names of the hosts that have submitted the tasks to various servers (only applies when there exists more than one server in the system of servers, clients and workers).
      (package private) TaskObjectsExecutionResults PDBatchTaskExecutorSrv.submitWork(java.util.Vector originating_clients, TaskObject[] tasks) 
      java.lang.Object[] PDBTExecInitedClt.submitWorkFromSameHost(TaskObject[] tasks)
      the main method of the class.
      java.lang.Object[] PDBatchTaskExecutorClt.submitWorkFromSameHost(TaskObject[] tasks)
      the main method of the class.
      java.lang.Object[] PDBTExecInitedClt.submitWorkFromSameHost(TaskObject[] tasks, int grainsize)
      same as the main method of the class submitWorkFromSameHost(tasks), except it also specifies the granularity of the breaking-up of the array of tasks into batches to be submitted to the workers.
